title: Chinnanchiru Idhayathil Lyrics Narthagi song lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Vijay Prakash, Prashanthini
Song: Chinnanchiru Idhayathil
Music : GV Prakash

[Chinnanchiru idhayathile mazhai thuli kudhikiradhe
Enna indha sondham endru, etti etti parkiradhe
Mazhai thuli vizhuvadhu mannuku theriyum
Manithuli serum-idam yaarukku theriyum

Idhu nadhiyaga odi, kadaloadu koodi
Muthaagumaa illai uppaaguma ] (2)

Kizhaigalil poo poothal ooruku therindhu vidum
Verilum poo pookum adhuthaan pen idhayam
Pen manadhin kadhal ellam, kairegai pole
Valara valra kooda valarum yeno konjam mele

Idhu kannai pinbam, adhai kaitheendum vayadhu
Dhinam anbaagi anbaagi alaipaayum manadu

Chinnanchiru idhayathile, mazhai thuli kudhikiradhe
Enna indha sondham endru, etti etti parkiradhe

Ovvaru vayadhinilum ovvaru kanav-irukum
Vazhve kanavu mayam enbadhaye maradhirukum
Thaozhamayin kai pidithu, nadandhu sellum podhu
Kadhal ennum ooruku adhu kooti sellum paaru

Silar theriyamal povaar, silar thrindhe thaan povaar
Ini edhirkalam ennaagum yaar solla koodum

Chinnanchiru idhayathile mazhai thuli kudhikiradhe
Enna indha sondham endru, etti etti parkiradhe
Mazhai thuli vizhuvadhu mannuku theriyum
Manithuli serum-idam yaarukku theriyum
Idhu nadhiyaga odi, kadaloadu koodi
Muthaagumaa illai uppaaguma
